mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_basic_table (od_number, us_id, od_name, od_phone, od_postcode, od_addr_basic, od_addr_detail, od_total_price, od_pay_date, od_status, pm_status) VALUES ( #{od_number}, #{us_id}, #{od_name}, #{od_phone}, #{od_postcode}, #{od_addr_basic}, #{od_addr_detail}, #{od_total_price}, sysdate, #{od_status}, #{pm_status} )

INSERT INTO order_detail_table (od_number, pd_number, od_amount, od_price) SELECT #{od_number}, c.pd_number, c.ct_amount, p.pd_price FROM cart_table C INNER JOIN product_table P ON C.pd_number = P.pd_number WHERE us_id = #{us_id}
